<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/common/exceptiongeneric"> <element name="exceptionGeneric" type="this:exceptionGeneric"/> <complexType name="exceptionGeneric"> <sequence> <element name="code" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="description" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="subCode" type="this:exceptionGeneric" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/factoryquotesorder/v1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:fact="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/factory" xmlns:order="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order" xmlns:item="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/factoryquotesorder/v1"> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/factory" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/Factory.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/Order.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" schemaLocation="../../../BusinessEntities/Item.xsd"/> <element name="FactoryQuotesOrderRq"> <complexType> <complexContent> <restriction base="order:Order"> <sequence> <element name="factoryId" type="fact:FactoryTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="orderId" type="string" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="items" type="this:ItemsType" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </element> <element name="FactoryQuotesOrderRs"> <complexType> <complexContent> <restriction base="order:Order"> <sequence> <element name="supplierPrice" type="decimal" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </element> <element name="ValidateOrderQuoteRq"> <complexType> <complexContent> <restriction base="order:Order"> <sequence> <element name="factoryId" type="fact:FactoryTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="orderId" type="string" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </element> <element name="ValidateOrderQuoteRs"> <complexType> <complexContent> <restriction base="order:Order"> <sequence> <element name="result" type="boolean" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </element> <complexType name="ItemsType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="order:ItemsType"> <sequence> <element name="item" type="this:ItemType" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> <complexType name="ItemType"> <complexContent> <restriction base="item:Item"> <sequence> <element name="itemId" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="quantity" type="long" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </restriction> </complexContent> </complexType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/factory" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/factory"> <complexType name="Factory"> <sequence> <element name="factoryId" type="this:FactoryTypeEnum" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <simpleType name="FactoryTypeEnum"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="SONY"/> <enumeration value="RAPIDSERVICE"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:fact="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/factory" xmlns:item="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/order"> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/factory" schemaLocation="Factory.xsd"/> <import namespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" schemaLocation="Item.xsd"/> <complexType name="Order"> <sequence> <element name="factoryId" type="fact:FactoryTypeEnum" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="orderId" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="items" type="this:ItemsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="supplierPrice" type="decimal" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="result" type="boolean" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ItemsType"> <sequence> <element name="item" type="item:Item" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2011 sp1 (http://www.altova.com) by End User (free.org)--> <schema targetNamespace="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:this="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/businessentities/item"> <complexType name="Item"> <sequence> <element name="itemId" type="string" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="itemName" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="itemDescription" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="quantity" type="long" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:v1="http://www.kallsonys.com.co/cim/message/Vendorquotesorder/v1">\r <soap:Header/>\r <soap:Body>\r <v1:VendorQuotesOrderRq>\r <!--type: VendorTypeEnum - enumeration: [SONY,RAPIDSERVICE]-->\r <VendorId>?</VendorId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <orderId>?</orderId>\r <items>\r <!--1 or more repetitions:-->\r <item>\r <!--type: string-->\r <itemId>?</itemId>\r <!--type: long-->\r <quantity>?</quantity>\r </item>\r </items>\r </v1:VendorQuotesOrderRq>\r </soap:Body>\r </soap:Envelope>
